furniture.name: nathaniel's sanctuary
furniture.desc: A sanctuary for orphans and paupers.
furniture.flavor: Nathaniel insisted magic be used for the benefit of the unfortunate.

furniture.name: bloodbane's anvil
furniture.desc: Great spells are often forged on iron.
furniture.flavor: Forsaking war and violence, Bloodbane devoted himself to crafting new forms of magic.

homes.name: wild's encampment
homes.desc: Deep in Delkin Wood, Master Wild kept his fabled camp.

spells.name: cyril's celestial sling
spells.desc: Free a star and unleash the fury of the heavens on your foe. Hopefully your star won't turn on you...
spells.flavor: If you're already star-crossed, why not make a few stars cross as well?

spells.name: kanna's dervish dance
spells.desc: Kanna's dance was a strenuous one for a mage, and a deadly one to her enemies.
spells.flavor: she danced with the devil in the pale moonlight, blades gleaming and blurring like a single streak of silver

encounters.name: ancient tablet
encounters.desc: A tablet on a dais displays a glowing list of names.
encounters.flavor: Chazza, Jiopaba, Kamianya, Alyx, Man of Smoke

encounters.name: weathered tablet
encounters.desc: A weathered tablet with a faded list of names.
encounters.flavor: Chazza, Jiopaba, Kamianya, Alyx, Man of Smoke

encounters.name: Study under Kanna
encounters.desc: A fox-girl delightedly teaches you some practical ways to use your weapon more effectively

encounters.name: jeremi
encounters.desc: Nothing is known about this mage.

encounters.name: phrenesis
encounters.desc: Phrenesis was forever preoccupied with the cycles of death and rebirth.

encounters.name: stags
encounters.desc: Nothing is known about the enigmatic mage.

encounters.name: Tainted, Archon of the Void
encounters.desc: A violent echo still wanders the halls it never walked

encounters.name: vondrey
encounters.desc: The mage does not appear inclined to speak.

encounters.name: master wild
encounters.desc: A mage of the wilds makes a perplexing teacher.

encounters.name: mister reaper
encounters.desc: A grim name for an otherwise respectable mage.

locales.name: hall of ages
locales.desc: The lost Hall of Ages was a gathering place of great and powerful patron mages.
locales.title: Mark of Ages
locales.flavor: the knowledge within may be beyond price.
